summary:
About - The boys club was watching the Trump rally when they saw an attempted assassination on President Trump. Disappointed in the way the Secret Service handled the situation, they knew they had to take matters into their own hands. They packed up and headed to Washington D.C. determined to protect President Trump. Join The Boys Club; Pepe, Brett, Andy and Landwolf as they embark on the presidential campaign to keep our beloved president safe and sound.

  -
